page.title: 10MALBOROUGH HOUSING
page.content: There are many{Housing Developments } in our{District.}One of them is in {Galmpton}where seven new houses are being built. Each house is made of stone, and they are all modern designs. Another development is {Portlemore Close}which has recently been built and added on to{Jubilee {Road,}which is a council estate.There are many other housing developments that have been developed over the years.{Malborough Park}was another building site which was built on for the war for a special purpose. The houses were built for the{R.A.F. serving in{World War Two.}The prices of the houses in{Galmpton}are higher than anywhere else in the{D-Block {because}they have a sea view. They are also the only houses that have been developed with a sea view.
